string.text: Weapons
Ammunition
9õ18 FMJ
Basic PM, PB, Fort-12 shell. Simple core, full metal jacketed. Weak armor-piercing action.
9õ18 PMM
Shell for PM, PB, Fort-12 with improved characteristics. Due to the high initial velocity and light bullet, its far more effective than usual 9õ18 FMJ. Slightly improved armor-piercing effect.
9x18 PBP
Shell for PM, PB, Fort-12 with improved characteristics. Perfect combination of armor-piercing and restraining bullet effects.
9õ19 FMJ
Basic HPSA, Walther P-99, Beretta92FS and HK MP5 submachine-gun. Ordinary jacketed bullet. Weak armor-piercing effect.
9x19 PBP

Shell for empty text HPSA, Walther P-99, Beretta92FS pistols and HK MP5 submachine-guns with improved characteristics. Solid shell. Expansive bullet, but with the armor-piercing core. Expensive ammunition.
Basic Colt1911, Sig220, USP Compact, Desert Eagle pistols shell. Simple core, jacketed bullet.
11.43x23 Hydro
So called “Hydra Shock”. Patron for Colt1911, Sig220, USP Compact, Desert Eagle pistols with improved characteristics. Expansive bullet with strong restraining effect.
5.45x39 FMJ
Basic AK-74, AK-74U machine carbines shell. Simple core, jacketed bullet.
Armor-piercing bullet for AK-74, AK-74U submachine guns. Improved armor-piercing effect and weaken restraining effect.
9õ39 PAB-9

Shell for “Groza”, “Val” submachine guns and special sniper rifle “Wintorez”. Latter and cheaper in manufacture modification of armor-piercing bullet. Has undersonic flight speed, but owing to the special construction, penetrates the majority of armors on distances up to 300 meters.
9x39 AP

Armor-piercing shell for “Groza”, “Val” and special sniper rifle “Wintorez”. Has undersonic flight speed, but owing to the special construction, penetrates the majority of armors on distances up to 300 meters.
9õ39 SP5

Sniper shell for “Groza”, “Val” submachine guns and for special sniper rifle “Vintorez”. Has udnersonic flight speed but owing to the heavy bullet (lead core) of special construction, penetrates the majority of armors on distances up to 400 meters.
Standard NATO shell, established under the Belgium index SS109. For assault rifles L85, LR300, Sig550, G36, FN2000.
Armor-piercing bullet. For assault rifles L85, LR300, Sig550, G36, FN2000.
Cheap in manufacture modification of sniper shell. For sniper rifles SVD, SVU-AS and machine-gun PKM.
Armor-piercing bullet. For sniper rifles SVD, SVU-AS and machine-gun PKM.
Sniper shell. For sniper rifles SVD, SVU-AS and machine-gun PKM. Improved accuracy and range. Expensive.
12õ70 Buck
Scatter shell. For shotguns ÒÎÇ-34, BM-12, Winchester-1300,SPAS-12. Effective on distances up to 30 meters.
12x76 Zhekan
Shell with heavy bullet. For shotguns ÒÎÇ-34, BM-12, Winchester-1300,SPAS-12. Effective on distances up to 100 meters.
12x76 Dart
Plumate bullet. For shotguns ÒÎÇ-34, BM-12, Winchester-1300,SPAS-12. Effective on distances up to 150 meters. Increased range and armor-piercing effect. Expensive shell.
Grenade for barrel attached grenade launcher Ì203 (LR-300, G36, Sig550, L85) and for integrated grenade launcher at FN2000.
VOG-25
Grenade for barrel attached grenade launcher GP30 (Ak74), for integrated grenade launcher of “Groza” and revolver grenade launcher RG-6.
VOG-25P

Grenade for barrel attached grenade launcher of GP30 (Ak74) , for integrated barrel attached grenade launcher of Groza, and for the revolver grenade launcher RG-6. Before the blow grenade bounces increasing the injurious action.
OG-7B
Grenade for RPG-7V
Gauss
Power capacities with prepared destructive elements in clip for Gauss rifle.
PM (Makarov)

Most widespread pistol of the Soviet era. Reliable, handy, cheap, but only with 7 shells clip with insufficient output and scanty accuracy. Newbie stalker’s weapon. Basic ammunition 9õ18 FMJ, 9õ18 PMM and 9õ18 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
PB

Pistol with integrated silencer. USSR task force weapon. Morally outmoded. Clip capacity – 7 shells. The only advantage – silent shot. Basic ammunition 9õ18 FMJ, 9õ18 PMM è 9õ18 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
Fort-12

Ukraine manufactured police pistol set in return for morally and physically outmoded PM (Makarov) Soviet era pistols. Average reliability. Has improved accuracy comparing to PM, increased clip capacity (12 shells) and handy hilt. Basic ammunition 9õ18 FMJ, 9õ18 PMM and 9õ18 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
FN HPSA

Supposed to be the weapon of experienced stalker. Browning HP is worthy considering being one of the best ÕÕ-th century’s pistols. Reliable, powerful, good accuracy. Clip capacity 13 shells. Basic ammunition 9õ19 FMJ, 9õ19 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
Walther P-99

New James Bond’s workmate. Ð99 – perfect pistol, excelling with high reliability and good accuracy, especially – in presented variant by 9mm shell. Clip capacity 16 shells. Basic ammunition 9õ19 FMJ, 9õ19 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
Beretta 92FS

Attractive Beretta is adopted in US Military forces, and many other militarized and law-enforcement units, police, both in the USA and in other countries. 9mm caliber. Clip capacity 15 shells. Basic ammunition 9õ19 FMJ, 9õ19 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
Colt1911

Good old fashioned Colt. Went through the 20-th century and commemorated its centennial in Zone. The most long-living army pistol. 0.45ACP caliber. Clip capacity 7 shells. Basic ammunition 11.43x23 FMJ, 11.43x23 Hydro ammunition with improved characteristics.
USP Compact

Considerable stalker-veteran’s gun. German quality. Powerful, high-quality and expensive. 0.45ACP caliber variant. Clip capacity 8 shells. Basic ammunition 11.43x23 FMJ, 11.43x23 Hydro ammunition with improved characteristics.
Desert Eagle

It was brought to the Zone by physics. But for some reason not in its 0.50 caliber variant, but in 0.44Magnum one, moving that way this heavyweight from his category into simple army pistols. It loses in its excessive weight and insufficient reliability. But this gun is worth considering with. Stalker-amateur’s weapon. But for the wealthy one. Clip capacity 8 shells. Basic ammunition 11.43x23 FMJ, 11.43x23 Hydro ammunition with improved characteristics.
ÒÎÇ-34

Usual hunting rifle. Ordinary weapon. One of the most widespread weapon types among the newbies. Ammunition: 12õ70 Buck – buck-stop, 12x76 Zhekan – heavy bullet, 12x76 Dart – plumate bullet for long-distance shooting.
BM-16

Usual hunting rifle. Ordinary weapon. One of the most widespread weapon types among the newbies. Ammunition: 12õ70 Buck – buck-stop, 12x76 Zhekan – heavy bullet, 12x76 Dart – plumate bullet for long-distance shooting.
SPAS-12

Smooth-bore gun SPAS-12 invented in the end of 70th of the XX century as the multi-purpose warfare gun for police and militaries. SPAS-12 is distinguished by high reliability and flexibility in usage, but on the other hand this weapon is heavy and complex, and therefore – expensive. Best gun for the close combat in Zone. Clip capacity 8 shells. Ammunition: 12õ70 Buck –buck-shot, 12x76 Zhekan – heavy bullet, 12x76 Dart – plumate bullet for long-distance shooting.
HK MP5À3

One of the best submachine-gun in its line. Added to special army and police divisions arsenal in last few decades of the 20th century in many countries. After its gradual substitution on more common models appeared on the black market. Handy weapon for the close combat in the Zone. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition 9õ19 FMJ, 9õ19 PBP ammunition with improved characteristics.
ÀÊ74

Kalashnikov machine carbine for 5.45mm shell. Kalashnikov machine were developed for existed martial doctrine – most economy, reliable and simple, handiness and shooting accuracy suffered from that. Weapon of military stalkers and middle-class stalkers in the Zone. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition - 5.45x39 FMJ, Armor-piercing bullet 5.45x39 AP.
AKS-74U

As to its dimensions and mass, AKS-74U is close to submachine-guns, however due to the used cartridge and mechanisms is considered to be short-cut carbine. Among the advantages of AKS-74U are high mobility straitened conditions, possibility of concealed bearing, rather high bullet piercing ability. Disadvantages – small aimed fire range, low bullet restraining effect, turned for overheating during fire. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition - 5.45x39 FMJ, armor piercing 5.45x39 AP.
Screw-gun BCC

Special sniper rifle. For silent and flash less firing. Rifle has an integrated silencer. Greatly “respected” gun in Zone. Pierces any self-wearing body armor from the distance of 400 meters. At that it can be done almost silently. Weapon of experienced stalker and veteran. Clip capacity 10 shells. Basic ammunition - 9x39 PAB-9, armor-piercing bullets 9x39 AP, 9õ39 SP5- sniper shell.
VAL

Created on the basis of silent sniper rifle “Screw-gun”, has folding rifle butt. Used by spec divisions in conditions requiring silent and flash less firing. Both guns – worth using. Clip capacity 20 shells. Basic ammunition - 9x39 PAB-9, armor-piercing bullet 9x39 AP, 9õ39 SP5- sniper shell.
Groza

Submachine-grenade cup discharge complex "Groza" ÎÖ-14. Very handy for in-Zone activities assault rifle variant. Compact, powerful, universal, reliable. Experienced stalker’s weapon – novice won’t probably have enough money for that kind. Military stalkers’ favorite weapon. Clip capacity 20 shells. Basic ammunition - 9x39 PAB-9, armor piercing bullet 9x39 AP, 9õ39 SP5- sniper bullet. vog-25 and vog-25ð grenades are suitable for the barrel attached launcher.
LR300

LR-300 nothing else but the new level of AR-15 development. LR-300 means – Light Rifle of effective fire up to 300 meters. Its quite high accuracy is ridden by the exceptionally smooth sear; rifle is highly maneuverable and handy, renders fast aiming. Highly pollution able type. Experienced stalker’s weapon. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition - 5,56Õ45 SS109 , armor-piercing bullet 5,56Õ45 ÀÐ

Submachine-gun with grenade cup discharge fixed with computerized sight-module of fire management and with 40mm grenade launcher. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition - 5,56Õ45 SS109 , armor piercing bullet 5,56Õ45 ÀÐ. Ammunition for barrel attached launcher - M209 grenades. Veteran/master’s gun.
L85A2

After changing this rifle by Great Britain in 2008 to German G36 black market acquired a lot of these ones. So it’s not unique inside the Zone. The only advantage of this weapon is good accuracy of the first shot and regular scope with 4x zoom. Unreliable. Too high dispersal when firing with burst. Clip capacity 30 shells. Basic ammunition - 5,56Õ45 SS109 , armor-piercing bullet 5,56Õ45 ÀÐ.
SVD

SVD widely used in almost all operations, held by Soviet and Russian armies from the moment when it was added to arsenal, and considered to be exceptionally reliable and handy sample of shooting weapons. Preferred by experienced stalkers from “DUTY” grouping – grouping of mutant hunters. Costs a fair bit at Trader’s. Besides can be obtained from sentry towers of the perimeter. But there are few who venture on that. Clip capacity 10 shells. Basic ammunition - 7,62Õ54 7h1, armor-piercing bullet - 7,62Õ54 àð, sniper ammunition with improved characteristics 7,62Õ54 7h14.
SVU-AS

Modern Dragunov rifle variant made according to the bull-pup scheme. Very suitable for long trips into the Zone, compact variant of powerful automatic sniper rifle. Very exclusive. Military stalkers are fond of these ones. Clip capacity 10 shells. Basic ammunition - 7,62Õ54 7h1, armor piercing bullet - 7,62Õ54 àð, sniper ammunition with improved characteristics 7,62Õ54 7h14.
Gauss rifle
Sniper rifle, invented by scientists in the Zone. Almost silent, uses artifacts’ energy for shooting. Very rare and useful thing.
GP-30
Grenade cup discharge fixed under the barrel for AK-74. Launcher ammunition– VOG-25 and VOG-25P.
Barrel attached grenade launcher for Sig550, LR300, G36, L85A2. Launcher ammunition –M209 grenades.
RG-6

Specific weapon. Revolver grenade launcher. For several tasks as clearing of the vast areas from mutants, harming the toughest beasts, attacking the base of the opposite grouping, this weapon can be apropos. Ammunition: grenades VOG-25 and VOG-25P.
RPG-7V

Old grenade launcher of the soviet times, remaining in abundance on the military facilities, wherefrom is transported into the Zone. Not quite an ordinary stalkers’ weapon. High weight and the size, and really “specific” usage make it really popular. However for several tasks, as clearing large areas from the mutants, harming tough beasts, attacking the opposing grouping base, can be nifty indeed. Ammunition – ÎÃ-7B
F1
Hand defensive grenade. Splinter damage radius – up to 100 meters. Throw from the cover.
RGD-5
Offensive hand grenade. Splinter damage radius – 25 meters.
Can you tell something interesting?
I have a lot to tell. But possibly you’ve heard of that kinda vermin like mutants a lot. I can acquaint you with us, “Duty” grouping. But don’t you dare to ask me about those morons from “Freedom”.
Tell me about your grouping.

We’ve been here from the very beginning. The grouping itself has been found by the toughies from one of special task forces, sent in the Zone to investigate the full picture of its appearance. We got into a serious scrape there. After the half of our troops has perished under the terrible circumstances, the ones survived swore that wouldn’t leave until they coped with the task.
You’ve mentioned about the “Freedom” morons?

Total imbeciles and bloody scums. They can’t get it clear that the Zone is the world’s pest place. Besides they want to stretch the Zone all over the world, to the every single distant place. They may use all the possible and impossible means for their goal. I can’t wait when we finish them.
Thanks.
Why don’t you let anyone pass to the North?
Cos we don’t need that rabble at “Rostok”.
What’s there on the “Rostok”?
It concerns you not! You’ll learn when you come there.
Listen, mate. I urgently need to go further. You understand?
Too insolent for the newbie. Or is it kinda gentle hint?! Well it may cost you about 500 rubles to get through.
Now we are talking. Take these money.
Deal, you can pass.
No thanks, I’ll make it myself.
Hehe, what a greedy one you are. Well, try.
Thanks.
Stop! You can’t go further! Newbies have nothing to deal with “Rostok”.
You’re not a bad guy, go ahead.
Hmm… What do you want?
Hi, I’m glad that you also don’t like mutants. It was fun. You’re decent guy. We’ll admit you to the North.
Can you tell something about the Dump?

Well there is nothing really essential in there. Dump as it is. Unless some maniacal bastard on the bridge that shoots everything that moves. It’s said that his head is wanted for reward. Moreover the northern road to “Rostok” is guarded by the “Duty” soldiers. You’d better don’t deal with those, guys in “Duty” a really gloomy ones. That’s it, I guess.
Noteworthy information, thanks.

Thanks for saving. Now I’m in debt. How can I thank you… O! Information costs money, so listen. I’ve seen monolithians while moving from the Dark Valley. Morose guys in brown uniform. I’ve never noticed them coming to the border so closely. And the bandits who arranged big base in there, I’ve hardly made it to escape. So be careful, if you wander there.
Ho ho! Hi, mate! Thousand thanks for saving my ass. I promise I’ll requite like for like.
Are you gathering here for no particular reason or what?
Bandits have plagued nearly everyone. Now I’m prepared, so lets move and give those bandits a rape session.
Can I go with you?
No its personal. No strangers, sorry.
Heard anything on the Gunslinger?
Yeah, but not too much. It’s said that he made it to the center of the Zone.
Haven’t you been acquainted with stalker Seriy.
I think that I’ve heard that he was waiting for someone on garage. But be careful – bridge near the crushed truck with corpses is occupied my that maniac bastard.
What is that maniac?
Ordinary Zone’s loony. Shoots everyone on sight. No chance to approach, cos of the immediate fire.
What kind of a corpse truck?
Recently in stormy night the truck has crushed here. Overloaded with stalkers’ corpses. Where they were taken to and from stays unclear.
Fine. I’ll be cautious.
Please do. Caution hasn’t yet harmed anyone.
Thanks.
Wait, Seriy, stand firm!
I am, I am. Got a med kit?
Sure. Take it.
Oh, thanks. I want to share secret with you. Take this flash drive, information on it will help you to get to the center of Zone.
Well.. Seriy.. I think it’s just not your day…
Dammit…
I’ve been shot… Shit! I’m unwell…
Hello, mate. Thanks for you help then.
Can you tell about the local?

Well, listen. We’re now standing at big fetid dump. All the bloody radioactive refuse and debris has been taken here after the accident in 1986. So it’s totally filled with that rubbish, above and beyond the anomalies here and there among the trash. That’s why the only one you can meet here is an ordinary newbies. Why the newbies gather bandits around them. Thus it’s better for you not to stay for long here. Further to the North – radioactive hot beds, trespassing without protection is fatal. If you go to the North, you’ll find the abandoned “Rostok” factory, stalkers’ bar in there you’ll find it with ease. Dark Valley to the East, gloomy, foggy place. “Agroprom” territory to the West. I’ll mark places on your map where you can get safely to.
What are you doing here?
And how do you think?
Searching for the artifacts?
You can put it that way. Everyone seeks for the artifacts, but not every knows where they truly can be found.
What do you know about that?

Of course, I know, otherwise what will I be doing in the place that lacks artifacts? I got the info on where you can learn about how to break through to the Zone’s center. I can sell if you’re interested. Two grands will do. You understand, that there are far enough artifacts in the center so you could reimburse it.
Okay, I’ll take it.
Deal.
Deal. But be careful, don’t put your ass under the fire. Hehe. I appreciate people with the sense of humor. Take a grand back. And buy water proof pants, ha ha.
No thanks.
Well, you choose.
Wandering?
You’re really funny indeed. We’re working here and they – having sweet time on vacations. Recently “worked” with the militaries. If you set too many questions – we’ll “work” with you.
Put your asses under the fire?
Ha ha. Yeah, I see that you’re kind of a guy with the sense of humor. I welcome that. I meet such guys too seldom. The other ones are too morose I say, afraid of the death.
I don’t have a clue.
You don’t say so, you don’t know. If you were to the Zone for the same time I did you’ll understand what are people doing here.
Well, whatcha want?
Whatcha doing here?
Putting our asses under the fire. Talk to Mole for details. He’s in chief here.
Gosh, what a stir, I won’t wish it to my worst enemy. Those militaries are too impudent indeed.
Put a picture of this place for me.

This is the “Agroprom” institute. The structure itself is situated in the south-west. And the large factory on the North – this is the institute’s production and technical base. Building have been abandoned long ago, and people have stopped thinking about it, cos there is nothing left to steal. But recently militaries started to search something there.
Give me more specific information on the institute.

Rumors say that until the accident in 1986 it was the single Gramineae selection and genetics institute building. Also there were experimental fields at the factory place. After the accident institute has been closed and the fields were burned. And then remembered, whitewashed the building, fenced in and built barracks. Constructed factory on the fields place. I don’t know what were they doing in that institute, but it’s obvious that they spent money left and right.
Give me more detailed info on the factory.

Factory has been built at the end of 80th. Supposed to construct and mend the machines, which can treat the radioactively infected soil. But as far as I know, no one has seen such a machine. Now it’s totally tenantless. Only stalkers like to stay at there. It’s said that it’s rather safe place, if not to peep into the dark corners.
Thanks.
